name: parked-domain
description: Elm project with local tooling (elm, reactor, review, format, test).

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n elm,css "pnpm exec elm-live src/Main.elm --path-to-elm node_modules/.bin/elm --port 8010 --pushstate --start-page=index.html -- --output=elm.js" "pnpm exec tailwindcss -i ./src/style.css -o ./style.css --watch"
scripts.build: pnpm exec tailwindcss -i ./src/style.css -o ./style.css --minify && pnpm exec elm make src/Main.elm --optimize --output=elm.js
